name: nashville-originals-are-back-again
title: Nashville Originals Are Back Again!
author: Morgan Levy
excerpt: The quarterly Nashville Originals discount gift certificate sale will happen tomorrow morning at an unspecified (but usually between 6:45-7:00am) yet ungodly early hour. Only the few, the brave, the proud will snag gift certificates to their favorite Nashville restaurants for 30-40% off. Valentineâ€™s dates on the cheap? Yes please!
